headline.main: Oil Majors Reverse Decade of Stalled Growth to Beat Supply Crunch Fears
headline.print_headline: Oil Majors Reverse Decade of Stalled Growth to Beat Supply Crunch Fears

lead_paragraph: Oil majors have long been passive watchers of the pump war between OPEC and U.S. shale producers, but not any more.
snippet: Oil majors have long been passive watchers of the pump war between OPEC and U.S. shale producers, but not any more....
